TopicTitle: Spacemouse PRO on Mac OSX Support

Articles.Content:
Hey there.

I bought a Spacemouse pro, a 6 dof mouse to play, and discover they only have support for Windows version of KSP.

Why?

Will it be available on Mac OSX too?

And more important, When it will work on Mac OSX?
Hi Climberfx, the 6DOF driver supports the Space Navigator device on Windows and OSX, please make sure that your device is compatible with this driver and is enabled in the settings screen

Hi Sal. It won't let me turn on. Just say the 6DOF is only for Windows users (on game config page)...

But i why try again, having in mind what you said...

Edited February 9, 2016 by Climberfx
You may be able to force it by editing the settings.cfg, I am unable to test this as I do not have a space navigator, or a compatible operating system.
